column1: Estimated Quarterly U.S. Retail Sales (Not Adjusted): Total and E-commerce1
(Estimates are based on data from the Monthly Retail Trade Survey and administrative records. Unless otherwise specified, all estimates are revised based on the 2022 Annual Retail Trade Survey.)
NA Not Available.     (p) Preliminary.     (r) Revised Estimate.
1 E-commerce sales are sales of goods and services where an order is placed by the buyer or price and terms of sales are
negotiated over an Internet, extranet, Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) network, electronic mail, or other online system.
Payment may or may not be made online.

Source: Retail Indicators Branch, U.S. Census Bureau. The Census Bureau has reviewed this data product to ensure appropriate access, use, and disclosure avoidance protection of the
confidential source data (Project No. P-7504206, Disclosure Review Board (DRB) approval number:  CBDRB-FY25-0002).
